CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 25, 1961, pg. A10, reads: "Sorority Tea - Alpha Alpha Chapter 16 of Alpha Gamma Chi Sorority, held its annual scholarship tea last Sunday, at the Eastern Star Home in Brushton. The successful event featured a delightful fashion revue in connection with the tea.  Seated, left to right: Joan Cawthon, Christine Cawthon, Julia Proctor, representing the Pittsburgh Council of Negro Women and pouring tea for Thelma Ryan Edwards, president of the sorority.  Standing : Mary Ann Taylor, Marie Jeanne Brown of Marie Jeanne Originals; Marie Bobonis, Lynne Taliaferro, Ardele Morton, Leonia Bryant, Goldie Hamilton, chairman; Susan Patterson, Celester Humphries and Eula Henderson Watson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alpha Gamma Chi sorority members, seated from left: Joan Cawthon, Christine Cawthon, Julia Proctor, Thelma Ryan Edwards; standing: Mary Ann Taylor, Marie Jeanne Brown, Marie Bobonis, Lynne Taliaferro, Ardele Morton, Leonia Bryant, Goldie Hamilton, Susan Patterson, Celester Humphries, and Eula Henderson Watson, gathered for annual scholarship tea, Eastern Star Home, Brushton
